tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DesignPlan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    architect_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    plan_description TEXT,
    estimated_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE design_plans (
	plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	designer_id INT NOT NULL,
	architect_id INT NOT NULL,
	project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE renovation_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(255),
    designer_id INT,
    architect_id INT,
    UNIQUE(plan_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES interior_designers(designer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (architect_id) REFERENCES architects(architect_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE design_plans (
    plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    designer_id INT NOT NULL,
    plan_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    plan_image_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE DesignPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  designer_id INT,
  architect_id INT,
  client_id INT,
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_cost DECIMAL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_designer FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES InteriorDesigners(designer_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_architect FOREIGN KEY (architect_id) REFERENCES Architects(architect_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_client FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id)
);
